Title: Decreases the length of the term of office for the governor and lieutenant-governor to two years
Summary: Decreases the length of the term of office for the governor and lieutenant-governor to two years.
LawCode: Amd Art 4 ยง1, Art 5 ยง1, Constn
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to section 1 of article 4 of the constitution, in relation to decreasing the length of the term of office for the governor and lieutenant-governor to two years; and proposing an amendment to section 1 of article 5 of the constitution, in relation to the length of the term for the comptroller and attorney general
